sub_title: MA in Arts, Culture and Society | Social Impact | Cultural Exchange | Interinstitutional Cooperation
summary: International Business Administrator with experience in planning, developing, and evaluating inter-institutional and cooperative projects related to education and cultural management. I am interested in being part of projects or organizations that promote education and/or culture, as well as their impact on society. I continue to advise people who want to study abroad.
